name: Psyche Verge
description:
In 2068 AD, humans finally deciphered the code of the brain, succeeded in describing the patterns and mechanisms of human consciousness. Subsequently, the mechanisms of brain functioning were successfully simulated by means of digital technology, making it possible to upload human consciousness to machines. This marked the beginning of the Great Uploading Era ....

Part of humans chose to upload their mind and become cyborgs, who were able to gain new vision by entering the electronic realm. The cyborgs greatly expanded the range of activities that humans could carry out, extending the main area of human activity from the orbit of Mars to 2-3 astronomical units outside the Kuiper belt. Then, human gradually moved the scope of life from the Earth to space stations within the solar system.

During the transfer to the space station, a mysterious crystal substance has been discovered. Its origin and purpose, is still a total mystery....
